title: Use Milvus as Vector DB for Document Similarity Search with Hugging Face Embeddings
author: Abhijeet Gorai
description: The MilvusRetriever class provides an interface to perform similarity-based document retrieval using the Milvus vector database and Hugging Face embeddings. It connects to a Milvus instance using provided connection credentials and supports adding documents and performing both synchronous and asynchronous similarity searches. The retriever utilizes the mixedbread-ai/mxbai-embed-large-v1 model from Hugging Face by default to generate embeddings. Key features include document retrieval filtered by filename and customizable search result count, making it ideal for vector-based search systems in NLP and information retrieval tasks.
